page.title: 20SURVEY IN N.CAVE & HOTHAM 2
page.content:
o s n restaurant 7 l9 56 hairdresser 43 17 24 mobile library l3 3 64 church,chapel 33 25 23 public transport l5 22 45
IMPROVEMENTS PEOPLE FELT NECESSARY IN N.CAVE & HOTHAM IN ORDER OF IMPORTANCE Surgery, Better Drainage, More Sports Facilities, Better Pavements,Chip Shop Less Traffic, Tennis Courts,More Shops Policeman, Youth Centre, Better Street Lighting,Cobbler,Tidy Village Campaign More Regular Bus Service,More Trees.
HOW THE VILLAGE HAS CHANGED: 'Too built up, too many snobs', 'more new residents','gardens tidier','more people shop out of village','more traffic due to motorway','mixture of people', 'villages have really changed
